price: (37) And a sign for them is the night. We remove[1269] from it the [light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ
footnotes: [1269]- Literally, "strip" or "peel."  Sunlight projected onto the earth is removed from it as the earth turns and night approaches.
